item.title: 62 & 257 洋基雙雄同場破紀錄
item.description: 🔼圖片取自New York Yankees FB粉絲專頁 美國時間10/04，這一天對全世界的洋基球迷來說，肯定都是個美好的一天。 2⃣4⃣9⃣ Strikeouts | @GerritCole45 The most by any pitcher in a single season in franchise history.

item.title: 卡彈7場! Aaron Judge 61轟終平美聯紀錄
item.description: 🔼圖片取自New York Yankees FB粉絲專頁 61 years since 61. Aaron Judge has written his name alongside Roger Maris in baseball's record books.
